short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: In response to a recent request for proposal, the Department of National Defence (DND) has updated the closing time for submissions. Please disregard all previous notice postings and adhere to the following,
description: The Department of National Defence has updated the requirement for the supply and delivery of four Pan and Tilt Devices. To work in conjunction with other equipement weighing 50 lbs, satisfactory products will be satisfactory if they have an anchor point for mounting, are durable and work in moderately severe conditions.
